requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (build 19043) or newer
  • Processor: Intel I5-1135G7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Xe
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: 30 FPS zoomed out. Can get to 60 FPS when zoomed in. I should note that this is a CPU heavy game. GPUs with 4 GB VRAM should be enough.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 4100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 740
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: 100+ FPS was achieved with this setup. I should note that this is a CPU heavy game. GPUs with 4 GB VRAM should be enough.
